Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
